```{r import}
tt <- read.csv2("https://www.data.gouv.fr/fr/datasets/r/6fadff46-9efd-4c53-942a-54aca783c30c")
#
tt$jour <- ymd(tt$jour)
```




```{r graphF}
zz <- tt %>% 
  group_by(jour) %>%
  summarise(sum(incid_hosp))
  names(zz)[2] <- "cas"
tail(zz,122) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = jour, y = cas) +
  geom_point(size = 0) +
  geom_smooth()
```

```{r}
tt %>% 
  filter(dep == 95) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = jour, y = incid_hosp) +
  geom_point(size = 0) +
  geom_smooth()
```
